featured.text: Clunes, in Australia, holds a monthly book talk that hosts authors to discuss their latest 14 .
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Scribner’s Monthly was a magazine promoting national parks.
Showing great talent in painting, Moran was soon hired as an illustrator at Scribner’s Monthly, and later appointed chief illustrator by age 34.

definition.example: I receive my salary on a monthly basis.
